The word is that the American executives behind the launch of Simon Cowell 's X Factor US are not convinced that Cheryl Cole is well enough known among the show's potential core audience. It was thought the American job was a done deal but it seems the US executives have had a last-minute change of heart. They are now questioning whether she's famous enough in America. At a industry event here, Sergio Marchionne three times referred to the "shyster" loans that the U.S. and Canadian governments made to save Chrysler in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said Friday. "When we did this deal back in 2009, we couldn't have borrowed a buck from a 7-Eleven store. The banking system was shut."
